alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:13PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Callahan, southeastern Jones, southern Shackelford and northeastern Taylor Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1011 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms from Albany to Abilene, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Albany, Baird, Wylie, Moran, Eula, Dudley, Potosi, Hamby, Impact, Mccarty Lake, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Us- 283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line, Kirby Lake and Admiral. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 283 and 315. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
